text:
Sharing her #MeToo story, singer Varsha Singh Dhanoa in a video posted on YouTube has claimed that Kaliash Kher tried to come in proximity with her even when she didn’t welcome the gesture. Varsha Singh Dhanoa said that the incident traumatised her as she considered Kailash Kher her “guru.”
Watch her narrate the entire incident in detail in the video below.
Not only Kailash Kher, Varsha Singh Dhanoa has also accuse music composer-singer Toshi Sabri of sexual misconduct. She said that when he met her in his car he was drinking alcohol and even asked her drink with her. When she refused, he put his hand on her thighs allegedly.
Varsha said she had approached him in hope of getting some work in the music industry.

title: After Sona Mohapatra, Another Singer Accuses Kailash Kher & Toshi Sabri Of Sexual Harassment
description: Sharing her #MeToo story, singer Varsha Singh Dhanoa in a video posted on YouTube has claimed that he tried to come in proximity with her even when she didn’t welcome the gesture. Varsha Singh Dhanoa said that the incident traumatised her as she considered Kailash Kher her “guru.”
